categories.label: Counterfeit / Brand Misuse
categories.guidance: Don’t imply a product is a replica or counterfeit. Use neutral descriptors (e.g., “inspired design”).

rewrite.guidance: Avoid claiming to diagnose, prevent, treat, or cure. Prefer neutral phrasing like “designed to support overall wellness.”

categories.label: Absolute / Guaranteed Claims
categories.guidance: No absolute guarantees; describe function and expected use honestly.

categories.label: Medical Testimonials / Before-After
categories.guidance: Avoid before/after implications for medical outcomes or disease names.

hints.title: Keep titles descriptive and brand-safe.
hints.description: Describe materials, features, and intended use without medical or absolute claims.
